context.title: Run Configuration for Symbolic Execution Workflow
context.description: This dialog allows creation and configuration of Symbolic Execution Workflows

context.title: Run Configuration Main Tab
context.description: In this tab you can choose which XLIA model to analyse and the type of analysis to do.

context.title: Run Configuration Common Criteria Tab
context.description: In this tab you can configure some criteria that are common to all 3 existing types of analysis. This includes setting arbitrary size limits to the generated graph, choosing the algorithm for graph generation or limiting the exploration though a limit number of steps.

context.title: Run Configuration Test Generation Tab
context.description: In this tab you can choose to generate text files during the symbolice execution. Those files contain execution traces and other informations.

context.title: Run Configuration Debug Tab
context.description: This tab allows debug traces and files generation (graphs, input/output...) for the symbolic execution.

context.title: Run Configuration Expert Tab
context.description: In this tab you can have access to more advanced options that depend on the type of analysis selected.

context.title: Run Configuration Refresh Tab
context.description: In this tab you can have access to options concerning refreshing the workspace after the symbolic execution.

context.title: Run Configuration Symbex-Runtime Tab
context.description: This tab allows to configure the Symbex-Executable used for the symbolic execution workflow.

context.title: SEW Console
context.description: This console shows symbolic execution log and spidergraph
